channel.title: [718/754] RuneAzura718 World 2 - HD Full-screen Compatibility || Amazing 718
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/5167/n1z.gif[/img] [URL=http://"http://RuneAzura.com/718"]★[SIZE=3]WEBSITE[/SIZE]★[/URL] [URL=http://"http://runeazura.com/718/RuneAzura718.jar"]★[SIZE=3]DOWNLOAD[/SIZE]★[/URL] [URL=http://"http://runeazura.com/718/vote"]★[SIZE=3]VOTING[/SIZE]★[/URL]
RuneAzura 718 is a brand new addition too the RuneAzura team. We currently have two servers as of last week, RuneAzura 317 was our original project and has been up for just under a year, with continuous updates. The RuneAzura team slowly came too the conclusion, "why not expand our services for the majority of Rsps players?" Therefore, we thought a great 718 would do just the trick bringing out all the new 718 features and content that we can not explore on the 317. [/CENTER]
[ul][li]Amazing 718 HD and full screen compatability.[/li] [li]Easy navigation with a user friendly teleports.[/li] [li]10+ Bosses with strong Economic Drop Rates, Teaming bosses is available![/li] [li]Lots to do - You will never get bored with on-going boss "contracts" and a Prestige system![/li] [li]Four levels of difficulty - Super Easy, Easy, Normal, Hard and Extreme.[/li] [li]Unique Donator and Server ranks - V.I.P Donator, Legendary Donator, Ultimate Donator, GFX Designer and Server Helper.[/li] [li]Unique Polypore and Jadikino lairs.[/li] [li]Fully Working QBD.[/li] [li]Flawless Matrix Switching.[/li] [li]Great economic PVM with realistic drop rates.[/li] [li]Fully working dungeoneering - Easy, Medium, High and [New] Daemonheim.[/li] [li]Fully working SOF, Squeal Of Fortune with realistic rates.[/li][/ul]
Many more amazing features too come in the near feature. Check RuneAzura 718 in game for more in-depth detail.
[CENTER]HD quality - Unique Bosses. [IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/2376/bv7k.png[/img]
[CENTER]Fully Working Dungeoneering at Daemonheim.[/CENTER] [IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/4416/5ao9.png[/img]
Polypore Dungeon. [IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/6697/cx7t.png[/img]
Jadikino lair. [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/324/hu7x.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Fight Caves. [IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/4132/1yks.png[/img][/CENTER]
*Please note: This is only a small advertisement due to the fact that the server is brand new, we are still in beta/development. We need active players and potential staff members, Join our team today!*
